average.description: Average number of requests allowed in a period

burst.description: Maximum number of requests allowed in a period

header.description: Header to get the client IP from

payload.description:
Webhook message (usally JSON),
required when template is not defined

format.description: The format of the access log.

use_default_categories.description: Use default app categories (uses docker image name)

match_domains.description: Optional list of domains to match

docker.description: Name-value mapping of docker hosts to retrieve routes from

include.description: List of route definition files to include
